mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.spbilldate AS "spbilldate", a.spaccnum AS "spaccnum", a.spstartdate AS "spstartdate", a.spenddate AS "spenddate", a.spstartdisplay AS "spstartdisplay", a.spenddisplay AS "spenddisplay", a.spprestartdisplay AS "spprestartdisplay", a.sppreenddisplay AS "sppreenddisplay", a.sprate AS "sprate", a.sploss AS "sploss", a.sptotalq AS "sptotalq", a.sptotalc AS "sptotalc", a.spbilltype AS "spbilltype", a.spttstartdate AS "spttstartdate", a.spttenddate AS "spttenddate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_direct_payinfo( id, spbilldate, spaccnum, spstartdate, spenddate, spstartdisplay, spenddisplay, spprestartdisplay, sppreenddisplay, sprate, sploss, sptotalq, sptotalc, spbilltype, spttstartdate, spttenddate, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{spbilldate}, #{spaccnum}, #{spstartdate}, #{spenddate}, #{spstartdisplay}, #{spenddisplay}, #{spprestartdisplay}, #{sppreenddisplay}, #{sprate}, #{sploss}, #{sptotalq}, #{sptotalc}, #{spbilltype}, #{spttstartdate}, #{spttenddate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_direct_payinfo SET spbilldate = #{spbilldate}, spaccnum = #{spaccnum}, spstartdate = #{spstartdate}, spenddate = #{spenddate}, spstartdisplay = #{spstartdisplay}, spenddisplay = #{spenddisplay}, spprestartdisplay = #{spprestartdisplay}, sppreenddisplay = #{sppreenddisplay}, sprate = #{sprate}, sploss = #{sploss}, sptotalq = #{sptotalq}, sptotalc = #{sptotalc}, spbilltype = #{spbilltype}, spttstartdate = #{spttstartdate}, spttenddate = #{spttenddate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
